Subject: Server is down
Description: The customers server is down and they are not able to log into EPP.
What_We_Know__c: 05Nov: EPP server is down. (502 Bad Gateway)
Solution_Comment__c: The customer has reported that their EPP server is not accessible anymore. After our investigation, we concluded that the CAP policies generate too many logs and need to be optimized. To access the server, the resources had to be increased, and after the CAP policies optimization, the resources have been reverted with no side effects.
